website_summaries.verdict: Super powerful and concentrated steam flow for superior cleaning power.
pros: Lightweight and portable with a nearly 10' cord
Good for indoor or outdoor use
Safe and effective on a bunch of surfaces like ceramic tile, granite, and most cotton and wool carpets
cons: Better for small jobs than it is for jobs that cover lots of space

customer_reviews.title: steamer cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this item I was very unhappy with the performance of the steam cleaner it leaked more water then steam. The manufacture contacted me and told me that I received a defected product and they would replace it at no charged. I received the new one it works much better, and I am much happier with the performance. I was impress with this company that they took the time to make things right.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Must have for toddler parents
customer_reviews.text: Cannot live without this. Gets rid of sticky toddler yuck that accumulates on everything three feet and lower in the home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pursteam works great!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my Pursteam. I purchased the Pursteam after reading quite a few reviews. I spilled something and now have a stain in the cloth seat of my brand new truck. I tried several cleaners, and also had the local car wash attempt to get the stain out. But, so far nothing has worked. The Pursteam did the job! My new car looks new again. This little gadget works great! I can't wait to try it out on a few other things around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Subjectus

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE  for the home!
customer_reviews.text: This little steamer packs one Powerful punch! This cleans grout like nobody’s business and is absolutely incredible at removing grease. I also used it to clean kitchen cupboards in preparation of a touchup staining. And customer service...WOW! Unequaled by any others out there. I can’t say enough positive comments about this steamer. JUST BUY IT!
customer_reviews.author: Ladiediver

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, Cleans & Sanitizes Kitchen & Bathroom
customer_reviews.text: I love my steam cleaner. It removed hard, sticky and gooey spots that regular cleaning could not dissolve. My countertops are white ceramic tiles with white grouting. After a few minutes of steaming my countertops are gleaming and look brand new. Among the many attachments are a window cleaner and a clothing steamer. Customer relations are the best I have ever seen. Emails are answered immediately. Telephone calls are very helpful. There was a problem with my first unit do they sent me a new steam cleaner without my even asking. They didn’t even ask me to return anything. Did I mention that I love my steam cleaner? Makes heavy cleaning much quicker and easier.
customer_reviews.author: Anne C. Reade

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend this product to anyone who needs to deep clean ...
customer_reviews.text: This steam cleaner was purchased to no small extent to help clean our house which we are about to move out of. I have only used this steamer a few times, but already I know that it is more than capable of performing where needed. I have been using cloths and other cleaning products to clean my window sills, the grout in my bathrooms among other things. As a test run, I used the steam cleaner to steam clean these areas and was quite impressed with the results. I would highly recommend this product to anyone who needs to deep clean some of the hard to reach areas.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas K. Giles

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE review
customer_reviews.text: Customer Service was amazing & sometimes, I guess maybe with shipping. Some things do not work. I returned not thinking of it. The customer service was so good. I got to try for a second time and this machine is amazing!!!! My first one purchased many years ago. I do not use chemicals in my house due to my mother dying of a rare lung disease. I just do not take chances with my family, but you want to clean and disinfect your house. Right? This machine is for you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Had one like this for years
customer_reviews.text: Had one like this for years. It finally broke so I ordered this one. Really like the addition of the hose attachment. I would of given it 5 stars but I don't like that you have to constantly hold the trigger button. I get that it's for safety purposes but I wish there was a way to lock it on because it is a little hard to keep it held down the entire time.
customer_reviews.author: Jewels

customer_reviews.title: Good reviews. Nice company to deal with.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't stay hot long enough to get much of any task, even small completed. UPDATE 8/4/18 The product distributor contacted me today after my review. As it turns out the device was defective, which we all know can happen. The company was great about it, very pleasant to deal with and issued a full refund along with a sincere apology. It seems like a great product according to reviews and videos I read and watched previous to purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Pegi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome At An Awesome Price!
customer_reviews.text: My first portable steamer purchase; I cannot believe the quality, value, and how much easier it is to remove things like dog slobber! Just a huge bonus. Makes things in your home ‘new’ again. Love the clothing steamer attachment too!
customer_reviews.author: TLF

customer_reviews.title: Professional quality
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive this hand held steamer. I opened it up and used it as soon as it arrived. I cleaned my sliding glass door, glass stove top, and kitchen sink. The second day, I used it to clean around the metal strip separating my living room carpet and dining room tile floor. It was amazing. All of the grime just washed away. I took a risk and wiped up the leftover water and I was done. No scrubbing or chemicals required. I plan on using this for many cleaning projects around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Patrisha B

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOTS of steam. Heats up fast (about 2 minutes with 160ml of water). Has a long and very flexible cord. Cools down just as fast to refill (assuming you used up all of the water). Like the accessories, too! Seems like a quality product that will last a very long time. Handle is cool after two refills. The safety valve is not as much of a "pain" as you might think.. Simply release all of the steam and it will cool down fairly fast for a refill. Had a few questions and the staff were very happy to answer any questions I had. Very happy with my purchase!!! Again....BUY IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey L. Pritts

customer_reviews.title: Cleaned the nooks and crannies just fine!!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to start using right away. I have a lot of patio furniture that needed genuine attention and this did exactly what I was needing to clean the woven cracks a crevices that I was not able to clean otherwise. My only recommendation would be to have a wall mount storage attachment to keep all attachments neatly organized together in one place. I'll keep the box in place of that for the time being.
customer_reviews.author: 2talljodi

customer_reviews.title: World's "worst " steamer. USELESS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: For everyone giving this 1 satar, I'm sorry!!!! You all couldn't of been more right. Just tried the steamer out in my bathroom and all I have to show for it is a sore hand. The steam release switch is so hard to depress. I have bad hands and thought this product would help me clean without hurting them. This steamer is useless!!!! Doesn't get hot at all, wouldn't even melt a candle. Without heat every application that comes with this is useless. Please don't waste your time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Am very happy with the steam cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Am very happy with the steam cleaner. However I am having trouble registering the product on line (there is no apparent form) and there is no way to request the free knife offered in the package.This was my first review in March 2018. Now I have misplaced the manual and find no place on line to find or download another one. Apparently it was never registered either.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Mary

customer_reviews.title: Spits water
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS STEAMER. I have a baby and have recently been looking into alternatives to harsh chemicals to clean the house. This is a great product to help me with this! I can even steam my daughter’s stuffed animals and toys and know they’re clean without having to use chemicals (cause the toys inevitably end up in her mouth!). I’m not sure if it’s user error, but after letting the steamer heat up, after the green light goes on, it always spits out water for about 30 seconds, then it’s steam.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen F

customer_reviews.title: Good steam, but needs grip strength
customer_reviews.text: The steamer is compact and not bulky even with cord. It can be a little heavy when it's fills and you have to constantly squeeze the trigger for safety reason. The attachments took a second to figure out, but easy to use. Overall it does the job. I wouldn't expect years or hard water stains and gunt to come off everything, but it works great in hard to clean corners in the shower. You have to let it cool down before refilling, but that just gives you a goos break. Stretch the fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Scout TV

customer_reviews.title: This does a great job of sanitizing
customer_reviews.text: This does a great job of sanitizing. However, I'm not that impressed with cleaning dirt and grime. I DID use it to sanitize my toilet. This isn't against the product, but be careful using it on the handle of your toilet flush handle. Mine looked like chrome. However, it is plastic and it cracked. This product does clean well around the base of the toilet and around the edges of my kitchen sink and did a very nice job. Shipping was a quick as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Nina H.

customer_reviews.title: you have to press pretty hard to get the pointed thing to attach
customer_reviews.text: Ordered steamer June 29, it arrived in two days just as order said it would. . Had a hard time trying to put on attachments, but finally discovered, you have to press pretty hard to get the pointed thing to attach. I loved it. Had parrot poop droppings in the carpet, and steamer has gotten them all out. I am more than delighted. It is well-made, a bit heavy though I suppose all of them are. Thank you Amazon for fast service. Never dreamed a package would be deliver ed here in rural Mississippi on a Sunday morning.
customer_reviews.author: caroleigh  T

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service and decent product
customer_reviews.text: Edit*** - I changed this to a 4 star because the manufacturer contacted me, told me the old one was faulty, and sent me a new one immediately. It did work better, but I would not consider it “World’s Best”. I do appreciate the customer service, and for the price, the new unit is a decent product. I like that it can hold a lot of water. It would be nice to have a viewer so you can see how much water to put in the chamber. This product does not work well. I purchased it to steam sheets and curtains, but it does not get hot enough to get all the wrinkles out. It just gets everything wet.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse R

customer_reviews.title: Will clean a sink, not for lefties.
customer_reviews.text: I received this steamer today, so I cannot speak to continuous use. I cleaned a particularly gross sink with it. It did get the sink very clean, but the trigger has to be squeezed continuously to get steam and is not really designed for a left handed person. The safety lock is also in the left and I engaged it repeatedly while using it . The sink is really clean now though. I have attached a before and after of the sink for a reference.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Great for cleaning and sanitising
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to sanitise our cat room after our new kitten had to be quarantined in there for two weeks with a parasite. Bleach doesn't kill the parasite and we didn't want to use ammonia so a steam cleaner it was. I steamed the whole room, three cat trees and multiple toys. It took a little over one tank of water and I did it in two 15 minute stints. The steam cleaner performed really well. It heated up quickly, produced the steam well and was easy and comfortable to use. I've also used it to clean our bathrooms and it does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Aeryndis

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: We love this steamer. Easy to use. We cleaned our windows and all of the dirt and grime in the tracks and sills of every window in the house. We were amazed out how well it blasted the dirt out of every corner. I'm sure we will find many more uses for this powerful steamer.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Carver

customer_reviews.title: Received in perfect condition via Amazon local delivery
customer_reviews.text: Received in perfect condition via Amazon local delivery. As soon as I received it I went around half the house hitting the nooks and crannies! It’s super fun to use and gives great satisfaction to cleaning nuts like myself.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Whetzler

customer_reviews.title: Powerful little machine
customer_reviews.text: This machine works very well for the price. The steam gets pretty hot and it's perfect for eliminating smells and killing things like dust mites ect. The only drawback is that it runs out of water quickly and needs to be refilled. It takes a little getting used to having to cool it off before adding more water. Overall I am really happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for small jobs
customer_reviews.text: Based on cost, this steamer is worth the money. You can't buy or expect these days for less than $30. This little steamer handles the small jobs just fine but for bigger jobs like cleaning grills and range grill plates, you need something larger and more substantial. Don't expect this steamer to do the job of a $100+ unit. Update: Worked great first time. Took it out after sitting idle plugged it in, and nothing. A total waste of money but then it was made in China. I guess my hope was too high.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Darby

customer_reviews.title: Great little steamer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace a Hoover hand held steamer that, after about 10 years, stopped working. This steamer works just as well. The water heats up quickly and the pressure is good. What I like better, is that there does not seem to be the water puddling that I experienced with the Hoover. What I wish this had, that my Hoover had, is a big paddle for cleaning large areas, but I can live without it. It does come with several other attachments that are handy. I would recommend this product, works well, easy to use and a very good price.
customer_reviews.author: Geener

customer_reviews.title: Compact and deep cleans
customer_reviews.text: I received and used my steamer last week. It is not an everyday use appliance, but a definite must have for the household. It is small, easy to fill, heats up quickly, and is easy to use. The tools that come with it make it versatile for almost every cleaning situation. Love this product. Thank you. Not an item I will use everyday, but have already used it and it works wonderfully. Easy to fill, heat up quickly, works great, and easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Wm or S McNeal

customer_reviews.title: Powerful portable steamer. Nice to have in your cleaning arsenal.
customer_reviews.text: Powerful portable steamer for small jobs. I used a canister steamer before, but I wanted something I could easily take from room to room. I was surprised how powerful the steam gets, especially how fast it starts up. Instructions are poor. I don't use steam to clean all surfaces, just hard to get seam lines and the refrigerator. Wow, the steam does a great job on gooy messes. I can't say anything about durability, but for the price, I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald E.

customer_reviews.title: Great item, reliable and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Excellent item! I have used it to deep clean my furniture and various things around the house. I'm sure there are more uses than I have imagined and hope to discover them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and useful item. Good for cleaning grout & tile over ...
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint about this is that the reservoir is very small and so the supply of steam doesn't last very long. However, this is a well constructed, inexpensive, and useful item. Good for cleaning grout & tile over a small surface area. Larger projects, like steam cleaning a piece of furniture, will take a long time and might be better suited to a bigger handheld steamer.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Pass on this Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This product strikes me as aggressively mediocre and a little useless. I followed all instructions and found its "cleaning power" decidedly lackluster. I did a test spill with tea and it cleaned up fine. A bit of gunk on my stove top? Not impacted by three cleaning cycles, even with the "narrow" attachment. On the note of attachments, they all fit pretty loosely and are of questionable help. Surfaces I tried: - glass - carpet - linoleum - tile - wood - steel Overall thoughts: If it doesn't clean well then what's the point?
customer_reviews.author: Drone

customer_reviews.title: Broke, weaksauce.
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after a couple hours use even though I was careful. I would recommend a non hand held steamer because youll to refill the reservoir far less often. This small steamer is for small jobs. Plus the steam stream is narrow so takes a lot of time to get an area heated and treated.
customer_reviews.author: PHIL

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed, won't budge any old stains.
customer_reviews.text: Cleans up soft gunk... tried it on my BBQ grill and didn't remove anything of note. I brush the grill after every cook so it's not terrible, but there are always small pieces here and there. Nope, steam did nothing to budge them.. Does fine in the kitchen or bath with new stains. Anything older than a month, doubt this will remove it. Not impressed. Over hyped.
customer_reviews.author: the hiking viking

customer_reviews.title: Steam cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I bought this steam cleaner with high hope to protect my sofa from ketchup marks and also to clean bathroom but it's a big disappointment. As per the instructions I filled it with water and then charged it for power but no power supply to the steamer. Tried all the options but no luck. I forgot to return/replace with in 30 days and their customer service is not supporting to replace. Finally end of throwing the product.
customer_reviews.author: AKumar

customer_reviews.title: Full of cold steam. No pun intended.
customer_reviews.text: Just like the other video...the steam cleaner does not shoot out extremely hot water just warm. The effort it takes to clean one spot is exhausting. And leaves behind a bunch of water.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Great at cleaning shower
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine ! I wanted to clean everything in my house. I bought it to clean my shower and it works fabulous to blast off mineral deposits and other junk that hides around shower doors and faucets. No cleaning products needed and I love the safety valve that keeps it locked until it’s cooled down and it heats up very quickly. Thank you for making a great product!!
customer_reviews.author: t4

customer_reviews.title: As effective on grout as chemicals
customer_reviews.text: I did 3 tests on grout (all with some scrubbing): cleaned with (i) steam only, (ii) chemicals, (iii) steam-chemicals-steam. Steam only was as effective as the other 2 ways. Water resevoir seemed small, which led to frequent refillings; but the tradeoff would be a heavier device. Had no trouble getting the cap off; just need to release pressure and let it cool a little. Had no trouble with the instructions. I have not yet used any of the attachments.
customer_reviews.author: Emalie L.

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my project!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use to recane some chairs. I used the shot of steam feature of the steamer to loosen the glue on the old cane and it worked perfectly. As a bonus I'll use the steamer for many other cleaning and repair projects. With all the different attachments , it's very versatile, and powerful quick steam. Can't speak to durability because I haven't had it long, but it seems to be made with quality materials.
customer_reviews.author: Birder2

customer_reviews.title: 100% recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I love the product. I used it so far on my baseboard and in nooks and crevices that my normal steam mop doesn't reach. The product is super easy to use and the attachments make my normal daily cleaning routine so much easier. My only complaint would be about the nylon brushes. With there being so much heat being emitted the bristles melted however the brush does help tremendously on tougher spots. I also looked at a compatible product however I decided to go with this brand beings there are more reviews. I'm very glad I went with this brand instead. I would definitely purchase as a gift for someone.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: The price of this is remarkable. For what it can do.
customer_reviews.text: Like the power of stream, great for wall grease and other things. Like the way it took off rubber on walls, got bikes hanging on them, Took it off with ease but also be careful will take part of Wall off too. Got plenty of grease in Kitchen will see how good this really works. 4yrs worth tried a little area.... (wow) . Won’t need a new paint job!!!!! Only bad thing needs a longer extension hose and cord.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie S

customer_reviews.title: Great Steamer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help clean the grime off the kitchen cabinets. It did an amazing job. The steamer is lightweight which makes it easy to use for extended periods of time without your hand/arm cramping. It also came with a lot of helpful tools and attachments. I steamed the wrinkles from my drapes using the upholstery attachment.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee M

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: Great steamer at a great price. Have used it several times in the past few days since I received it. Used it to steam some older cabinets and it really helped clean the old dirt and grime from them. Also have steamed around our baseboards, the storm door glass, bathroom mirrors and all of the stainless fixtures throught the house. I cleaned a couple of spots on the floorboard in my wifes car and it only took about 2 minutes to do. Comes with plenty of accesories and stores away easily in a small cabinet. Worth the money and very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazingnobody

customer_reviews.title: Keep up the good work guys, just one small problem though
customer_reviews.text: Great product, steams wells, heats up fast. I would like to see a more direct temperature listed by the manufacturers on this product though. I see speculation in the comments but when I read the manual I did not see that information or maybe I missed it. I do like the different nozzles provided and I know it comes out pretty hot, you can see it smoking when you use it even.
customer_reviews.author: ShadowSlayer2056

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use, great value
customer_reviews.text: I just got this steam cleaner yesterday to do a deep clean of my house for moving. I used the brush attachment to clean the grout and faucet areas and it worked great! It was very easy to assemble and the water did have to be refilled to finish the task, but it was a big task! It cleaned my window sills extremely well, getting dirt out of crevices that has been there for years. I was looking for more things to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn E.

customer_reviews.title: Needs more features
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this steamer to clean a house. I have owned steam cleaners for years. This steam cleaner has no window for water level. How does a person see if it's out of water? I am cleaning 1800 square feet of a house. Stopping & refilling th unit every 15 minutes is not productive. I also purchased to clean grout in our home. Will update you later on that deep cleaning. This was rated "the best" - I am just looking for a few more features that are user friendly. Plus who wrote the directions?
customer_reviews.author: Joanna A Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this steamer!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to buy this steamer! Had so many good reviews I thought for sure it would would work great but I was wrong! Seriously doesn’t clean at all and wasn’t very hot! It basically blows dirt and dust around and spills water. The water tank runs out in about 2 minutes and the red light goes on. Don’t waste your time or money. I’ll be sending mine back ASAP!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonshopper103

customer_reviews.title: Hopeful
customer_reviews.text: I saw many posts about this, and so I purchased it right away. I received the cleaner, and there was no instructions, and it looked cheap. I wasn't expecting anything fancy, it just looked meh. It said the cord was 9.8 feet long, it's about half that. It took us a good hour to figure out how to put it together. Also... no way to tell how much water is left in the reservoir to see if you're out/running out. Definitely a major design flaw. It states it takes off mold. I couldn't get it to come off. I couldn't get simple water stains to release on my bath tub, nor bathroom sink. I was super hopeful. Kinda disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: AAC

customer_reviews.title: Waste of $
customer_reviews.text: Nope does not get hot, odd cool steam air. I am able to put my hand in front. I had black decker steamer that got lost in my storage unit Amazing high pressured steam . Moving into an apartment that the person before had cooked and never cleaned 1/4” grease grimes up.I used my other (BD) steamer I could see the steam lift the grease, curl up. This thing is a waste nothing like a real steamer . It just makes everything wet just annoying I spent $ on that BD just not working now:(
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Returned it
customer_reviews.text: I found it difficult to press for steam with one hand and point nozzle on hose with other hand. I used one brush attachment for small job and it was smushed. Went to website and could not find any way to register warranty or find replacement parts. I hate a website that is not user friendly. Had to email to register warranty and inquire about parts. Communication with company was horrible - until owner contacted me to apologize for problems. Decided if hard for me to use AND website did not support customer, better to return. I'm not ordering one that has control on same handle as nozzle as I feel it will be a lot easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Wizard50

customer_reviews.title: Easy small hand steamer for small to medium cleaning jobs
customer_reviews.text: This steamer has lots of attachments, is easy to fill and use. It is fairly light and you can steam pillows, toys, windows, clothes, spots on walls, floors, etc. Uses pure water and therefore you don't have to worry about residue or poisons with children or pets. It has a nice lock valve feature to keep the steaming from going off when you don't want it. The only improvement I would suggest is a window into the water reservoir to see when it is almost empty.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Senehi

customer_reviews.title: Not a good steamer - planning to return
customer_reviews.text: It makes a puff of wet steam and then peters out and then the light turns red . Then I wait for green and get a puff of wet steam and it peters out again. Don’t waste your money on this . Edit : the company’s customer service is excellent so I added a star. They did sent a replacement which does get hot unlike the first one but it’s less than a minute of steam and then it has to recharge . And it’s still too wet to use on the couch
customer_reviews.author: rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: This device will clean almost anything. Granted, it's dangerous, as it's using pressurized steam to clean your stuff! Read the darn instructions! It's important that you understand how it works so that you can make sure it does what you need. Prolonged steam on anything plastic... its gonna melt. That also goes for the brush attachments. Short bursts of 1-3 seconds of steam is really all you should need. Then wipe and let the attachments cool for a few seconds. This thing can do amazing things, but some tasks require a bit more patience.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea ward

customer_reviews.title: Great for small jobs
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight and easy to hold. The extensions and add-ons are convenient, but you can only blow steam for a small amount of time. Maybe a minute max at a time? It heats quickly and once you exhaust all the water (which is a very small amount), you have to release all the pressure, unplug it and wait for it to cool down to be able to take off the cap. It’s a safety feature that I love, but it’s a bit inconvenient to wait if you have a large job. It will remove dull cheap matte paint off your walls and wood. Found out by accident. It’s a great product for small jobs all over.
customer_reviews.author: TruthBeTold

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: I have six cats and purchased this steamer primarily to deal with pet stains. I was delighted with the results, but was doubly impressed with how this unit used high pressure to steam away stubborn kitchen and bathroom gunk with no chemicals, just water. It is quite easy to use, and includes a multitude of versatile attachments. I hoped for cleaner carpets, and got that along with cleaner sinks, shower, toilet, stove top, oven, etc. Oh yeah, it's great for wrinkled fabrics. Great first impression. If this steamer has a decent lifespan, it will displace a lot of the chemical cleaners in my cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: johnkenrick

customer_reviews.title: A product that works as  advertised
customer_reviews.text: We are cleaning all surfaces to protect our hoe against COVID-19. This device gets to many areas and does a better job than we could do by hand. Well worth the $40 price. A side benefit is we on't have the horrendous and unhealthy odors and fumes when using chemical cleaning products. My husband and dog also thank you for having a way to clean that is free of fumes. Also, we do not have to worry about the used cleaning fluid an where to safely dispose of it. Short of having a professional cleaning service this is a great option.
customer_reviews.author: pesach kremen

customer_reviews.title: This is ment for lighter jobs.
customer_reviews.text: I have tested it on removing calcium stains on plumbing fixtures, which it couldn't remove. I also tested it on removing grease and oil from a vehicles metal, this removed very little. So this isn't suitable for that kind of work. I did try it to remove a stain on suit pants and that worked. This product works, but is clearly unfit for heavier work. It is easy to operate once you get use to it, and runs for a long time on a full tank.
customer_reviews.author: Bryant

customer_reviews.title: And the downtime waiting for it to cool to remove the cap to refill is a pain
customer_reviews.text: This does the job and is small enough to tuck away under your sink or in a closet. I use it for floors as I have a small pooch. I also use it for kitchen sink, area rugs, and just about anything to refresh or clean without harsh chemicals. The cons are that the cord could be longer as not to have to keep unplugging and moving from outlet to outlet. And the downtime waiting for it to cool to remove the cap to refill is a pain. Otherwise a good product as advertised...
customer_reviews.author: rosemarie francis

customer_reviews.title: 10oz of water is not allot.
customer_reviews.text: My only purpose of buying this steam cleaner was to try to remove a mildew smell from upholstered chairs . I’ve only used the steam wand. It seems to work well. I did find it hard to hold the handle of the container up and use the wand. I’m right handed so to hold the handle in one hand and the wand in another, I found it heavy. It seems like the on/off light would be on the opposite side of the container. When the light is green it’s heating....best used when the red/ hot light is on..and yes it does cycle from green to red.
customer_reviews.author: Nettie

customer_reviews.title: Easy Peasy Steaming!
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well on floor mats, seat belts, leather panels, and was making noticable difference in carpet. Didnt quite finish testing on car interior but will say I am pleased with this purchased. The packaging was even impressing, each item individually wrapped/sealed, and everything seemed to be placed not crammed or protruding pieces. Very easy to handle and is ready to use fairly quickly. I would give all 5 stars, however, steamer does not have water level indicator and the "trigger" can be a chore for more than spot cleaning, almost need a kung fu grip for full steam. You can't go wrong with 'The World's Best Steamer', I can honestly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Not for water stains
customer_reviews.text: This product does not remove water stains from bathroom glass, even when used with the most effective glass cleaner. But what I need most is to get rid of the water stains. The quality of the water in my city is very poor. The glass in my bathroom soon became opaque. This product is still effective in cleaning other dirt, but I don't have much other dirt to clean. After all, cleaning a house is an endless task. I must have other places to use. I'll keep this product. If the water stain to be cleaned, do not buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: happymom

customer_reviews.title: Does a good job on some things
customer_reviews.text: The unit comes with many attachments and no information on what the individual attachments are used for. The manufacturer's website didn't provide any help with that either. The manual (such that it is) provided just about enough information to be able to use the unit. I had purchased it to clean the grout on my kitchen floor and it worked somewhat but not as good as my old toothbrush method. It's a lot easier than the toothbrush method though. It worked beautifully lifting a pet stain off my carpet and removing guck from around my kitchen and bathroom faucets. I still haven't figured out what all the attachments are for but it's lightweight and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna Fisher

customer_reviews.title: This works well!
customer_reviews.text: This works well for it’s intended use! The water reservoir is relatively small so nonstop continuous use will only last around 5 minutes with a decent decrease in pressure. If using the cleaner intermittently and for spot cleaning it will hold adequate pressure and obviously last a much longer time. I see people thinking the water reservoir cap is unable to come off after first use. I ran into the same problem before realizing that if you do not release the pressure after turning off the cleaner/heating element the pressure will stay contained keeping the safety mechanism from allowing the cap to open. Don’t assume it’s defective! Hope this helps. Great product overall.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Biggs

customer_reviews.title: ratings
customer_reviews.text: I searched the rating sites and found the PurSteam to be in the top 3 of almost every rating site and often #1 but for me it does not clean, yes it heats up well and emits steam but with very little pressure it just doesn't clean well, not nearly as good as a spray cleaner and elbow grease, after one use its now going into my yard sale pile.
customer_reviews.author: buzz039

customer_reviews.title: Not so good!
customer_reviews.text: Bought based on positive reviews, unpacked and tried in different places, bathroom, kitchen, floor... lastly I decided to do a test with thermometers (posting only one video here) because I didn’t see that worked like it is supposed to, well... found it that max steam out temp was 150F, so isn’t hot enough remove pretty much anything. I tried to repeat the steam on the same spot over the kitchen, multiple times but isn’t hot enough to even to soften the grease.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Great little steam cleaner
customer_reviews.text: It loads water on top and has metal fixtures on the boiler knob screws. My previous one loaded on the bottom and just had a plastic cork to seal it. It also is more powerful than my previous steamer. It produces a great amount of steam. I also like the added safety feature that you can't open the boiler until the pressure has gone down. All you need to do is press the trigger until the steam is released so it doesn't slow down refilling the tank for larger jobs. My first tank cleaned my filthy sink and stovetop.
customer_reviews.author: Shopoholic

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but handle is hard to use!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE how well this product cleans! I was able to remove stains in my grout and rust in my shower. It holds a lot of water and seems to keep going and going. However, there is one negative thing about this product. The handle is very hard to use. I have still not been able to LOCK it in the open position so that it continues to spray without having to hold it open. My hand started hurting after a few minutes and I was unable to get it to stay open (continuous spray on). I will have to keep playing with it and see if I can figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: Greta Henricksen

customer_reviews.title: Steamer is little but don’t let that fool you, I loved the results
customer_reviews.text: When receiving this little steamer I wasn’t sure what to expect, it was my first one ever. I wish I had purchased it sooner, the first item I cleaned was my stove. We would clean it but it would always feel greasy after, never could get it really clean. After using this steamer for a few minutes I instantly noticed a difference. It lasted a good while with the amount of water that is needed too! I would say this is something handy to have around in everyone’s houses. I cant wait to use it on my next cleaning project.
customer_reviews.author: Manny

customer_reviews.title: Like new couches!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this particular steamer because of all the customer service reviews, because this world is missing that far to often. After using it I'm happy to report that the quality far exceeds the price point. It's heavy duty with strong stream of steam, I'm not even sure how that much pressure could be generated in there. I've scrubbed these spots on my couch from my dog multiple times and nothing came off. Held the steamer over it for 30-60 seconds and took the brush to the cushion and it was like wiping fuzz off the surface. My couches look brand new!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Boudreau

customer_reviews.title: Gets blood out of carpet
customer_reviews.text: I gave this 4 stars because it works in some areas. I tried to use to clean the shower but it appears to just want to sanitize things. Great during covid but not what I bought it for. My boyfriend cut his foot and walked on my white and light grey carpet. He tried to us a cleaning spray whit was able to clean a little. I used the brush function and all of it came out. Good as new. So even though my shower didn't get clean I can sanitize it and clean carpets. Overall happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great product that works!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product. I had a a bed bug infestation and I have used this steamer to go over the couches from top to bottom with great results along with a spray to prevent those pesky bugs in the future. I also had some stains in the car that have been Attempted to remove with carpet cleaning and have not come out with other chemicals. So, I use the steamer that blasted right through the stains and really made it look virtually new. It gives out nice steady steam. The tools are great and really give this product a lot of versatility. Great price for a great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Manny G.

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, super easy to use, very effective; highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical at first. I bought it based on the reviews of how versatile it is, but mostly to “clean” my furniture that smells like the 8 years of dogs that lay on the pieces. With RugDoctors out of commission due to the pandemic, I thought i’d Try it, but how can a steamer that doesn’t extract really clean? Let me tell you. My living room no longer smells like dog and my furniture looks nearly brand new. Even the spots that were flattened from sitting on them. I did spray some pet odor neutralizer on it first, and had to refill the tank numerous times, but they were gross.
customer_reviews.author: gypsyish

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and cleans great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hand steamer for cleaning and disinfecting areas , it’s great to use in the bathroom on sinks and around the toilet, also on furniture, just be sure to let the water heat long enough that it’s just steam that comes out or the furniture will get too wet. The only draw back that I can see to this machine is that it runs out of steam pretty fast and you have to fill it up and wait again to get hot, also you can’t open the fill lid until it cools a bit, so it’s a bit time consuming, but they may all be that way, this is the first one that I’ve owned,
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Lambe-plaster

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: I got this thinking it was easy based on reviews. However this is far from the truth. I got thia to simply clean hard surfaces. Boy o boy was I mislead!. The attachments you have push hard in order to get them in place that should have stopped me from continuing to try, but I continued and tried another attachment and still nothing was being cleaned!. I tried a few surfaces to see and this thing simply does not do the job. Maybe I got a defective one but right now i do not recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: And I was so excited.....
customer_reviews.text: Just took everything out and used it for the first time. I was steaming the inside of my oven, to see if I could get rid of a few spots in there. Seemed to be working ok, and I went through my first tank of water. Unplugged it to let it cool down, and now the cover for the water will NOT open again. I have spent 30 minutes working on it, pushing down and turning counterclockwise, as the instructions state, and it will NOT open. So I guess this was a one time use machine. Unless the seller contacts me, I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: James Moore

customer_reviews.title: Worked one time and has not worked since.
customer_reviews.text: I did not try to use this Pursteam steamer when I first got it but when I did decide to try it the handle would not go in to let the steam out even though the green light was on. I followed the directions enclosed and used distilled water. I did finally get it to work one time and it steam cleaned very good but it has not worked since. I have tried to get it to work many times, it heats up the green light comes on but when I push the button on the handle nothing happens. So disgusted with it.
customer_reviews.author: Rev. Penny Dean

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable Performance!
customer_reviews.text: This handheld pressurized steam cleaner by Pursteam is one of the best purchases I have ever made. What I thought were unremovable stains on several different surfaces were quickly, easily and completely removed. The safety features alleviated any fears I had about using a pressurized steam cleaner. The 9 piece accessory kit allowed for many different applications. You can’t go wrong with this steam cleaner!
customer_reviews.author: obgyndoc

customer_reviews.title: Great item for the home
customer_reviews.text: I have only had the product a short time and so have not attempted all the tasks that I have in mind. However, I have had a chance to use it and found it a wonderful tool. It did wonders in the bathroom and on some chairs. The most rewarding was the shower stall in the bathroom. looks like new again when chemicals wouldn't work. Having used it, i found it very easy to use and an effective cleaning aid. I expect to use it much more on clothes, garage and in basement, now that i know how effective it is and how easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Great for cleaning dirty air conditioner evaporator coils (the one in the home).
customer_reviews.text: It came with many attachments and very clear instructions. It is easy to use. I cleaned 2 office air conditioners that were filled with mold, dirt and maybe mildew. It cleaned it right up and the coils look new and the air is now fresh smelling. I also used it to sterilize commonly touched areas. I look forward to cleaning my home with it. The only problem was getting the hose to attach to the steamer. You have to use a little strength to get it to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Coconut eater

customer_reviews.title: Is there a tool to help push down and unscrew the top?
customer_reviews.text: There needs to be a tool to help push down and unscrew the steamer. It takes hand strength I do not have.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not enough power to clean stain
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to use, but it's not powerful enough. I had to wait for a while after the light turn green to get any decent pressure. That good pressure lasts for probably five seconds before wearing off and I have to wait for half a minute again. Even at its peak pressure, it can hardly remove anything that I couldn't easily wipe with a cloth. It's probably only useful for places where you couldn't wipe or touch and the dirt isn't that sticky.
customer_reviews.author: WuJJ

customer_reviews.title: Great item for small jobs.
customer_reviews.text: Have only used it so far to steam clean a couple of small areas, in a small, high-traffic bathroom. Seemed to work pretty well. You'd probably need something larger for big projects, as you'd need to be refilling the tank pretty frequently (and letting it cool down between fillings a bit). Good deal for the price, though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A VERSATILE TIME SAVER
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cleaner to help with the cleaning of a rental property after the departure of a particularly neglectful tenant. The walls and base boards were covered in melted was, crayon markings and a significant amount of dirt and grime. This cleaner worked exceptionally well and made the cleaning significantly easier than scrubbing by hand. The stream did the trick, it lasted a reasonable amount of time between refills, and it was light and easy to handle with one hand.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Denis

customer_reviews.title: Not hot enough
customer_reviews.text: This item could use a see through fill line. It does not get hot enough. Also it doesn't stay warm long enough. Every two minutes the green light (ready) changes to red, heating up again. Also, putting the attachments on was tricky. The big plastic tightening knob kept spinning, not making contact. Had to contact company. Turns out that you have to wiggle the attachment back and forth with some force in order to make contact and screw it on. Didn't say that anywhere in the manual. Liked the compact size but was not pleased with over all performance.
customer_reviews.author: Peg

customer_reviews.title: If you do not use the safety features you can get severe burns.
customer_reviews.text: I have used steamers for years. There was a problem with the heat light on this one. I received the replacement order within days. I love this steamer. Especially on my kitchen stainless. Its a must in the bathrooms-especially with boys. My windows have no buildup or streaks. I use it to freshen area rugs and remove stains without dragging the carpet cleaner. I literally use this daily. My 2-year-old lab is a sloppy drinker. Easy to sanitizes his water area. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Bender

customer_reviews.title: Out of the box and put to use!
customer_reviews.text: I received my steamer today, pulled it out of the box, checked over all the attachments, read the booklet and went to work on steam cleaning my furniture. I love that it will allow you to open the tank while there is still pressure, just turn it off, unplug it, let the unit cool down for a little bit then squeeze the handle and release what is left in the built up pressure.. Once the pressure is gone the tank knob will turn correctly and allow you to open it. Here's to deep cleaning with no chemicals!
customer_reviews.author: KathyB

customer_reviews.title: Does a good job
customer_reviews.text: Some people expect commercial level performance from this little guy, so you won't get that. Also, keep in mind that with the long flexible nozzle attached, the steam gets 'cooler' by the time it reaches the tip of it. But if you use it with the non flexible (short nozzle) directly attached to the steamer, it works well and does what you expect it to do (of course, remember, it is a hand held small appliance so set your expectations as such.)
customer_reviews.author: Faz

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: This is not worth your money and time. It does not steam. It just looks like it’s steaming due to the pressure. I bought this so I can sanitize chemical free. But this unit does not even heat enough. I can’t imagine how it can kill bacteria or insects. I can even put my hand in front of the nozzle and feel like I’m getting a facial. I don’t want the bacteria to feel relaxed! I want to sanitize stuff! This is annoying!
customer_reviews.author: Martyka

customer_reviews.title: update: seller replaced defective unit and it works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I expected. I knew for the price it wouldn’t be commercial grade so it works fine for my 2 vehicles. The problem though is it completely loses pressure at 10 seconds TOPS. I have to then wait about 30 seconds for it to re-pressurize only to get another 10 seconds of steam. I was really looking forward to this little gadget but am unfortunately unsatisfied. Updated 8/28/19: The seller bent over backwards to make this right. Julia sent me another free of charge and this one works perfectly. Couldn’t be happier. I highly recommend buying from her
customer_reviews.author: Crissy Ligon

customer_reviews.title: Can’t open the cap after first time using it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product a month ago and just now opened and using it.... i used it once and now I can’t even open the cap at all.... i tried everything yo open it but idk why it won’t open... I didn’t even finished cleaning my couch.... and it smells like a plastic ... i used it for only 10mins and now i feel like i wasted my money on it.... i wished i used it right away to find out if it works or not so I could’ve returned it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: James skaggs

customer_reviews.title: Works super.
customer_reviews.text: Excellence in quality and functionality. The folks who are complaining about the cap not coming off should just be patient and read the instructions. There’s a safety lockout in the cap so you can’t take it off if the chamber is pressurized. Let it cool off or release the pressure with the trigger and you can refill it. There’s more than enough steam to get the job done. It comes with all kinds of attachments. I use it for all kinds of neat stuff, from taking mildew out of the grout in the kitchen, cleaning the John, and even cleaning the plastics on my golf cart. It’s seriously a miracle tool.
customer_reviews.author: Muhhuh

customer_reviews.title: Save your $ buy a scrub brush @ the 99 cent store
customer_reviews.text: Deep clean HA! I spent 3hrs on my kitchen island, which is only 3' by 4' & all I got was a really soar hand. Despite multiple times switching hands, due to cramping from holding trigger, I still ended up hurting. I finally gave up and scrubbed my counter with a lil baking soda & a scrub brush. Wish I had started with that. My husband said buying it was a mistake but I was determined to prove him wrong. Well he wasn't and Ive got what feels like carpel tunnel to prove it. Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: kira Boynton

customer_reviews.title: It work pretty good. I would like it to get hotter.
customer_reviews.text: It’s pretty good. All kind of attachments. To me the steam doesn’t get hot enough, maybe that’s for safety reasons. I’ve used it on my cooktop to remove grease and it worked. use it in the shower to remove mold and mildew. It worked pretty good. Didn’t remove all the mold in the deep crevices. It woks as I said. I have one more thing I’m going to try. It won’t have to get super hot for this job so we shall see.
customer_reviews.author: firefly

customer_reviews.title: SIMPLY AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.text: Though I rent, & as i like to keep clean, especially in the kitchen, I was AMAZED at how much unseen grease & grime this steamer removed! I'm excited I invested in this steamer. It had taken but about 2 minutes for it to be ready for use. What I also did was add 1 capful of vinegar to prevent mineral/hard water deposits from clogging any internal/nozzle tube/s. I highly recommend this! Well gotta go, I'm on a mission to go on a cleaning rampage😂
customer_reviews.author: djefuse

customer_reviews.title: Makes things look new again (restoring a old pick up trucks interior)
customer_reviews.text: One pic is of the door i used it on and the other is the door im doing next it Works great! It cleaned off all the grime and nastiness off of the door panels on an old work truck im trying to fix up. It did what hours of a rag and cleaners couldn't do. Really made this thing look brand new. I just wish i would of bought the next size up because im using this thing on everthing and would like to not have to refill so much but it is definitely getting the job done for 30 bucks instead of buying new panels and trim it's hard to beat in
customer_reviews.author: ChiefWhitetruckBlackcar

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and great price
customer_reviews.text: It has helped get the troublesome pet stains off my new carpet without scrubbing and ruining the carpet fibers. I have some set in stains that are slowly starting to disappear, and with a couple more steams, should permanently disappear.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie M Deschaine

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money. I got this today. Followed the awful instructions and when the light turned green, I tried it on my sink faucet and it didn't budge a bit of anything off of it. It is being returned.
customer_reviews.author: Di

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: This steam cleaner has not much cleaning power. I used it to clean the shower doors and the oven door which was a tiring process and I am not impressed with the cleaning results either. You have to press down the steam release switch to get the steam. After a while this will cause hurting your hand. All in all, its a cheap cleaner but I have not found one task which elbow grease and soft scrub would the trick in a faster manner. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Forest

customer_reviews.title: The pressured steam can only last for a few seconds
customer_reviews.text: It's very disappointing as a cleaning product, because it cannot hold its pressure and temperature long enough. I used a stopwatch to time this. For only the first 5 seconds, it is probably OK before the steam pressure becomes mediocre. Then at ~35 seconds, it completely lost pressure and you will have to wait for the red light to turn green again. And if you want high pressured steam, you'd better wait for a little bit longer. Otherwise the pressure is just pathetic even if it gives the green light.
customer_reviews.author: Sid Q

customer_reviews.title: wonderful steam cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I just received my Pursteam. I purchased the Pursteam after reading quite a few reviews. I spilled something and now have a stain in the cloth seat of my brand new couch. I tried several cleaners, and had no sucess on getting the stain out. But, so far nothing has worked. The Pursteam did the job! My new car looks new again. This little gadget works great! I can't wait to try it out on a few other things around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Kerwyn Rhon Williams

product_meta.title: PurSteam World's Best Steamers Chemical-Free Cleaning PurSteam Handheld Pressurized Steam Cleaner with 9-Piece Accessory Set Purpose and Multi-Surface All Natural, Anthracite
feature_bullets: 100% ALL-NATURAL STEAM CLEANING: Hot pressurized steam eliminates grease, grime, mold, stains, and bed bugs without harsh chemicals.
EASY HANDHELD USE: Lightweight and portable unit comes with a long 9.8-foot cord for convenient indoor and outdoor use.
SAFE, MULTI-PURPOSE CLEANING: Safe to use on a wide range of surfaces including ceramic tile, granite, waterproof wood flooring, laminate tiles, most cotton and wool carpets, and washable wallpaper.
FAST-HEATING: Heats quickly with a 3 to 4-minute warm-up time.
9-PIECE ACCESSORY SET: Deep clean the hard-to-reach areas of your home using the heavy-duty attachments for more targeted cleaning. Extension hose for different attachments.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars9,388 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
